practical_performance.name: Practical Performance (PP)
practical_performance.description: A practical Performance (PP) assessment will provide direct evidence of whether candidates have acquired the competency for the ability statements by solving a scenario-based problem.
practical_performance.focus: The Practical Performance (PP) assessment focuses on providing authentic evidence of candidates' ability to apply Azure cloud computing skills in realistic scenarios.
tasks: Candidates will complete practical tasks that demonstrate their ability to assess cloud solutions, develop implementation plans, and resolve implementation issues within the Azure environment.

evidence.LO1: Candidates will configure and assess Azure cloud solutions based on given specifications, demonstrating their understanding of cloud computing.
evidence.LO2: Candidates will develop and execute an implementation plan for deploying Azure cloud computing resources, showing their ability to plan cloud implementations.
evidence.LO3: Candidates will troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Azure cloud computing implementations, demonstrating their ability to review and resolve problems.

submission: Candidates will submit configuration files, implementation plans, and issue resolution reports as evidence of their practical performance in Azure.
This includes screenshots and logs demonstrating the functionality and configuration of Azure services.
practical_performance.retention_period: All submitted evidence, including configuration files, implementation plans, issue resolution reports, and assessment records, will be retained for 3 years to ensure compliance with institutional policies and for auditing purposes.
